## Installation

### Install from PyPI
```bash
pip install dazzlesum
```

### Install from Source
```bash
git clone https://github.com/djdarcy/dazzlesum.git
cd dazzlesum
pip install -e .
```

### Windows with UNC Support
```bash
pip install -e ".[windows]"
```

### Development Installation
```bash
pip install -e ".[dev]"
```
